name: Italian Pasta
description: A classic Italian pasta recipe with rich tomato sauce.
instructions: Boil pasta until al dente. In a separate pan, heat olive oil and saut√© garlic. Add tomato sauce and cook for a few minutes. Mix in boiled pasta and garnish with basil and Parmesan cheese.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A popular Indian dish with marinated chicken in a spiced curry sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook onions, garlic, and ginger, then add marinated chicken and cook until done. Add tomato sauce and simmer until thickened.

name: Egg Roll
description: A delicious appetizer made with a savory filling wrapped in a crispy shell.
instructions: Cook ground pork with garlic and ginger. Add shredded cabbage and carrots, and stir-fry until tender. Place a spoonful of filling on each egg roll wrapper, fold, and roll up. Fry until golden brown and crispy.
